title: Norwegian Typophiles
content:
Hi guys. I just made a group on Facebook called Norwegian Typophiles. I hope it might help connect people over here. Wish me luck! And do feel free to join if you have the slightest connection to Norway.

Cheers
author: Frode Bo Helland

comments.content:
I'm a font designer of Norwegian decent living in Minnesota. But I can never find facebook groups.

--  
David Bergsland
